unsigned int dt_device::dd_record_fid_accessed

Definition at line 1732 of file dt_object.h.

struct list_head dt_device::dd_txn_callbacks [read]

List of dt_txn_callback (see below).

This is not protected in any way, because callbacks are supposed to be added/deleted only during single-threaded start-up shut-down procedures.

Definition at line 1731 of file dt_object.h.
